meaningMnemonic: We are ready to <kanji>confront</kanji> <kanji>war</kanji>, if we have to. We are going to start the <vocabulary>resistance</vocabulary> against your regime, confront you, and even make war.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
